summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Experienced Front-end Developer with over 2 years of expertise in building large-scale trading platforms and modern e-commerce applications. Proven track record in contributing to Vietnam's leading securities systems (VPS, ACB) and developing high-performance admin dashboards. Proficient in the React ecosystem (Next.js, Redux) with a strong focus on scalability, real-time data processing, and backend integration using Node.js.

jobs.project: Web Trading Platform for VPS Securities
jobs.description: Core developer for Vietnam’s largest securities trading platform, ensuring high availability and real-time performance.
responsibilities: Developed critical financial modules including Fund Transfers, OTP Authentication, P&L Reporting, and Portfolio Management.
Implemented real-time Market Data & Price Board features using WebSocket (Socket.io) for instant trading updates.
Optimized application performance and rendering speed using React.memo, useMemo, and virtualization with react-window.
Ensured seamless UX with multi-language support (i18next) and robust form validation using Yup.
Collaborated in an Agile environment using Git flow for code reviews and version control.
jobs.tech_stack: ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, Redux-Saga, TailwindCSS, Socket.io, Radix UI

jobs.description: Built a comprehensive admin portal to streamline internal operations and management workflows.
responsibilities: Designed interactive dashboards and implemented Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for secure user management.
Enhanced system maintainability by adopting a modular architecture and creating reusable components.
Integrated with Spring Boot backend to manage products and service modules efficiently.

jobs.description: Developed a full-featured multi-vendor marketplace supporting diverse product categories and online payments.
responsibilities: Engineered key user flows: Homepage, Product Details, Shopping Cart, and Secure Checkout.
Managed complex global states (Cart, Wishlist, Orders) utilizing Redux Toolkit and Saga.
Boosted SEO and load times with Next.js SSR/ISR strategies and lazy loading techniques.
Built a dedicated Admin Dashboard featuring real-time sales analytics and order tracking using Chart.js.
jobs.tech_stack: Next.js, ReactJS, Redux, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, NestJS, Cloudinary

jobs.description: Created a responsive dashboard for tracking investments and portfolio performance with real-time analytics.
responsibilities: Visualized complex financial data through interactive charts using React.js and Chart.js.
Implemented real-time data synchronization via WebSocket and RESTful APIs.
Integrated dark/light mode theming and multi-language support to enhance user accessibility.
jobs.tech_stack: ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, Redux Toolkit, NestJS, Prisma ORM
